reviewText: Frankie did it again this time he was in LA. Also, on this dvd Frankie gets personal and in touch with the audience.Frankie delivers another great show as usual. All, I have to say is that I recommend this dvd to any MAZE fan. I love this whole dvd. I enjoy every song on this dvd.  He sings some of his best songs. I was glad to see him perform "We Are One". Frankie's band is always full of energy they can really put on a good show. You can't lose with this dvd. I love his performance of Running Away and We Are One. Frankie is just indescribeable he is increduously talented and there are no words to describe him.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I really enjoyed this dvd of Frankie Beverly and Maze.  I'm a fan, and I have been since the early 80's in California when I first heard that he was discovered by Marvin's ex-wife.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I saw Maze for the first time back in 1978, I was so excited I bought every album from then on. I love their style, their lyrics, their rhythm and I really love Frankie Beverly's smooth velvety voice. My children and grandkids love them now,and even my Mother is on the bandwagon uh-huh. Anyone who knows me is aware of my love for Frankie. They are one of the greatest groups ever!!!LaVetta
Title: N/A

reviewText: I agree with all the previous comments...it's classic Frankie B and Maze!  The sound is great and is the video.  The issue I have is that is rather short... I wish they would do a solid 2 hour concert with the majority of this songs...they truly stand the test of time!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Maze&Frankie Beverly  are R&B Music Treasures.this is One Act where forget about Charts,New Releases,etc... Maze&Frankie Beverly have some of the Most Die-hard Fans on the Planet.the fans get into it big time.this DVD is tight but not quite as tight as the Live from New Orleans,but it's still a Soulful time had by all.

reviewText: Frankie and the gang definitely put on a good concert! I really enjoyed it.  There music is wonderful.  Buy it.  You won't regret the purchase.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is an outstanding DVD!  Frankie Beverly was in his prime, his voice was superb, and Maze is jamming!!!!  I was actually at this concert when it was filmed.  I play this over and over again!!  I have all of the Maze DVDs and this is one of the best ones!
summary: Maze Featuring Frankie Beverly Live in Los Angeles

reviewText: If you love the classic hits of Frankie Beverly and Maze, you'll love this concert DVD. Myself and my friends have really enjoyed jammin' with the band!
